Sensing the heat resonating from the oncomming laser fire, Tucson performs =
an impressive back flip, sailing right over the beam itself, and quickly sh=
oots off a pair of plasma tipped arrows from his cross bow in the direction=
 of a quick moving sonar wave, sent out by his own sonar systems.  The ping=
 is instantanious and it takes him no time at all to zero in on Nightstrike=
 and shoot the device clearly out of his hand, pinning it to a wall deep wi=
thin the room!

Like a skilled gymnist, he lands gracefully on two feet, st=
ill holding the cross bow in hand.

" I would've ducked but I thought I'd t=
ry something original.  Anyway, I think SOMEONE IN THIS ROOM has assumed th=
at just because I'm blind, I'm more vulnerable to attack.  I beg to differ.=
"

He preloads several more arrows into the cross bow.

" So who would like=
 to see an encore?"
